subject: Steroids
Perjury
lead_paragraph: After an anonymous urine sample from 2003 was tested for performance-enhancing drugs, Barry Bonds lawyers and federal prosecutors battle over whether it can be used as evidence at his trial.
snippet: After an anonymous urine sample from 2003 was tested for performance-enhancing drugs, Barry Bonds lawyers and federal prosecutors battle over whether it can be used as evidence at his trial.
